info.author: Brian Fisher & James Paige
classifiers: Operating System :: Microsoft :: Windows :: Windows NT/2000
Topic :: Software Development :: Libraries :: Python Modules
info.description:
Motherhamster is a 2D game library in for python. It brings together elements of
pygame pyopengl and wxpython. Motherhamster emphasizes built-in game editors,
and 3D acceleration of 2D graphics, and features a built-in graphical profiler.
info.name: Motherhamster
info.summary: A 2D game engine emphasizing built-in editors
info.html_description: Motherhamster is a 2D game library in for python. It brings together elements of pygame pyopengl and wxpython. Motherhamster emphasizes built-in game editors, and 3D acceleration of 2D graphics, and features a built-in graphical profiler.
